comment:
COLOR/ Light Honey
AROMA/ Sweetness, Alcohol, Slight Wood, ever so Slight Honey, , Nouget, Slight Solvents
FIRST SIP/ Sweetness, Honey, Smoothness, Slight Apple
TASTE/ Woody, Sweet, Honeys, Smoothness, Aged
FINISH/ Smooth, Sweet, Warming,  Nuttiness Slight Woodiness
MT GLASS/ Caramel, Wood, 
91 proof

Remarks
This my friends is a great buy for a bourbon whiskey small batch It has a uniqueness that is difficult to taste through. All the different flavors it has lends to great complexity... there's wood, there's nuts, there's caramel, there's honey! Overall a delectable beverage! Drink it neat or on the rocks I'm sure slight bit of water would add a little bit to its flavor profile. Without carrying on this is a very, very enjoyable beverage!
Be Kind, Be Generous, Be Real, Be Responsible!!!
CH33RS

This is a very unusual bourbon. Smell is sweet and not very strong. The color is very very light, almost like I had just poured a light beer and not a bourbon. The taste is sweet and that is about it. Not complex at all but that is not necessarily a bad thing. I poured a couple glasses neat and thought sweet, smooth and boring both pours.  Price was right at 20$ so cannot complain too much.
Harsh nose, but seems to mellow after awhile. Made with a splash of peach schnapps, orange peel and cherry. Good price.
Seemed a bit harsh at first taste. I usually like an edge. Not my favorite. Price was nice. Probably better with a mix. Smooth middle and no aftertaste if that makes any sense.
This is a great buy from Kentucky. Everything you love of bourbon for a decent price. I shoulda bought more when I was there
Oh god, the burn, no flavor, why did I buy this?!
It’s Bourbon. Not very good. Clerk at the liquor store recommended it, and now I know not to bother with his recommendations
